page.title: 20The rural fringe of Preston
page.content: Much of square 5031 is rural, there being a number of farms. The largest of these is Valentine House Farm. Most of the land is given over to permanent pasture. Both the Lancaster Canal and the Preston to Blackpool railway line pass through the area. There is also a small part of the district of Ingol comprising mainly housing but also a primary school and a social club. ************************************** PAGES 16 TO 20 COMPILED BY: Stephen Davies, Ian Scott, Steven Howarth, Allan Crossley, Nigel Walters, Colin Wignall, Caroline Edwards, Donna Bache, Julie Quine and Paula Mashiter of Ashton-on-Ribble High School in Preston, Lancashire. TEACHER: Mr. Kenneth Youde.
